about_the_game:
This is an apocalyptic survival sandbox game.In the game, you must constantly collect supplies to survive, but you will be attacked by a lot of zombies.

Zombies will attack the player, and they will attack each other, and as long as you use this properly, you're going to enjoy this game.

You can collect as many items as you like in the game, or you can slaughter as many zombies as you like, depending on you.

Main features:
There is a rich variety of goods in the game
Flexible zombie AI
Endless monster refresh mechanism
Friendly interactive system


Future features:
On-line systems, building systems, planting systems, domestication systems

The game is similar to “Project Zomboid”

name: 最后一个地球人

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, 7, 10
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Dual Core; Quad-core recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1 GB of RAM minimum and GLSL 1.2 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: FMOD compatible sound card

short_description: Doomsday survival games. You can fight zombies, steal zombie supplies, the zombies will fight each other, and you can take advantage of them... The game takes place shortly after the human Dark Forest Strike
